title: Rock Gnome
content:
Rock Gnome Racial Features Gnome Cunning Base Racial Speed Subrace Traits Darkvision Artificer's Lore

Gnome Cunning Base Racial Speed

Darkvision Artificer's Lore

Rock Gnome is a Subrace of Gnome in Baldur's Gate 3. Rock Gnome has the Artificer's Lore that lets them gain bonuses on History checks. While creating your Character in Baldur's Gate 3, you can choose between 11 different types of Races.
